rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that provides a welcoming entry to the farmhouse.

rooms.name: Open Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area combining kitchen and living space with large windows to the east for morning light, aligning with Vastu principles. The kitchen counters and appliances are arranged ergonomically.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features natural light from the east and north, with a built-in wardrobe for additional storage.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-East oriented for relaxation and well-being

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A second bedroom located adjacent to the master bedroom with a view to the south-west.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A utility bathroom connected near the bedrooms for convenience.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North facing to keep in accordance with traditional layouts.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated office space designed on the north side of the plot ensuring a quiet and distraction-free environment. It includes ergonomic workstations.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-East aligned for focus and productivity

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A comfortable library space with ample book shelving, natural light from the east and north windows.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North aligned to encourage learning and intellectual activities

openings.description: A robust entrance door set in the central facade with a secure vestibule.
Large windows placed in living areas and kitchen to ensure ample natural light and ventilation.

vastu_overview: The design incorporates Vastu principles with careful orientation of major spaces; the main entrance is placed in the North-West corner to harness positive energy, while living areas are arranged towards the east and north to maximize sunlight and ventilation. The home office and library placements further ensure a balanced environment for work and study.

building_norms.local_requirements: The design adheres to local building norms of Indian residential architecture with emphasis on structural durability and space utilization, while maintaining open layouts typical in farmhouse settings.
building_norms.material_specifications: Use of locally sourced materials and finishes that complement the Brutalist aesthetic.
